part_description: Four equally sized drawers arranged vertically, each with a handle centered on the front panel.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out of the cabinet frame on metal tracks, allowing smooth movement. The handles are attached to the front of each drawer, providing a grip for pulling. The drawers are stacked, sharing the same vertical space within the cabinet structure.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can store items within its drawers, interacting with users who pull the handles to open and close them. It stands on a flat surface, and the top can be used to place additional items. The cabinet can be positioned against a wall or within a room as needed.
